name: Giulian
title: IT-System-Engineer
bio: I'm Giulian, a passionate Developer and IT-System Engineer with a love for creating elegant, efficient, and user-friendly digital solutions. With a background in IT systems and a knack for coding, I specialize in building backend and web applications that not only look great but also perform seamlessly.

values.title: Automation
values.description: Streamlining processes to save time and reduce errors.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: Building solutions that are maintainable and scalable for the long term.

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: Always exploring new technologies and expanding my skill set.
